name: Kevin Loaec
cooked: I don’t believe the absolute timelock fits well in dead-man-switch situation, and i despise stacking multiple wallets (including past ones) as we currently cannot “disable” an old wallet in Bitcoin. Users will do mistakes, address reuse of old wallets, fuck up their descriptor backups, and until we solve the xpub reuse properly, it’s also bad for privacy and compatibility between wallets (need a state to make sure no key/derivation is reused)
